info.name: SaveMoney - Content Management API
info.description: API collection for managing website content for the SaveMoney application. Includes public routes for fetching content and protected admin routes for CRUD operations.

item.name: Public Routes
item.description: Endpoints accessible to all users for viewing website content.

query.description: (Optional) Filter content by the page it appears on (e.g., 'homepage', 'about-us').
(Optional) Filter by status. 'published' is default for this public route.

request.description:
Retrieves all published content sections. This is used to display dynamic content on the frontend.

You can filter the results using query parameters like `page` to get content for a specific page (e.g., 'homepage').
Retrieves a single published content section using its unique slug.

item.name: Admin Routes
item.description: Protected endpoints for administrators to create, update, and delete content.

request.description:
Creates a new content section. This endpoint requires admin authentication and accepts `multipart/form-data`.

- The `content` field should be a JSON string.
- The `imageUrl` field is for file uploads.
- After running, it saves the new `contentId` and `contentSlug` to collection variables.

Updates an existing content section by its ID. Requires admin authentication.

Only include the fields you want to update. It also accepts a new `imageUrl` file if you want to replace the image.
Permanently deletes a content section by its ID. This action is irreversible and requires admin authentication.

variable.description: The JWT token for an admin user.
Automatically populated with the ID of a newly created content section.
Automatically populated with the slug of a newly created content section.
